DOC.brief_title: The Effects Lycopene High Risk Prostatic Tissue
DOC.criteria: Male Have history prostate biopsy indicate HGPIN without cancer within 2 year prior registration . At least 4 week must elapse last biopsy biopsy use baseline data . Have AUA symptom score < =25 time registration . Refrain take lycopene , selenium , vitamin E , antioxidant supplement within 1 month randomization . Participants must agree refrain take nonstudy dietary supplement study Refrain take exogenous hormone , drug affect hormone metabolism , specify nonprescription substance ( e.g . saw palmetto , PCSpes ) take affect prostate within 1 month registration . Patients must also agree refrain take nonprescription substance study Be willing limit intake lycopenecontaining food study Have prior cancer ( except basal cell squamous cell skin cancer ) complete remission least 5 year Be ambulatory , capable selfcare able carry light sedentary work Have dietary fat intake 2348 % calories Participant 's physician recommend repeat biopsy 46 month randomization No repeat biopsy plan Not willing change diet Have diagnosis prostate cancer
